subdisciplines.name: Political Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the moral principles and values that should guide political behavior and decision-making.

subdisciplines.name: Political Epistemology
subdisciplines.description: The study of knowledge in political thought and its relation to political practice.

subdisciplines.name: Political Ontology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the nature and existence of political realities and entities, such as power and authority.

subdisciplines.name: Political Theology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the religious and theological foundations of political thought and practice.
